sub_title: Rare Disease Patient Advocate & Speaker for Acanthamoeba Keratitis | Founder & Chairwoman at Acanthamoeba Keratitis Eye Foundation  | Multicultural MarCom Project Manager
summary:
Committed 𝐀𝐜𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐡𝐚𝐦𝐨𝐞𝐛𝐚 𝐊𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐬 (𝐀𝐊) 𝐏𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐀𝐝𝐯𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐞. After experiencing this 𝐫𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐞𝐲𝐞 𝐝𝐢𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞, due to lack of education regarding 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐞𝐬 and 𝐰𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫 and after connecting with 𝐀𝐊 𝐖𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐢𝐨𝐫𝐬 going through this journey; there is much to be done for 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐥𝐞𝐧𝐬 𝐮𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐬 and the 𝐦𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐟𝐢𝐞𝐥𝐝 about 𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧, 𝐝𝐢𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐨𝐬𝐞, 𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭, 𝐩𝐚𝐢𝐧 𝐦𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭, 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡 and 𝐬𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭. Creator and Founder of the foundation first worldwide foundation focused on Acanthamoeba Keratitis. www.akeyefoundation.com 

From a 𝐦𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥 𝐮𝐩𝐛𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠 to an 𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐟𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤𝐠𝐫𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝 in 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐣𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭. Able to 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐧𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐩𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞 and understanding their needs. Dealing with people from 𝐝𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐜𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬 means adapting your way of communication, so we all can accomplish the same “objective”. I work 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐮𝐥𝐭 𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐝, 𝐩𝐫𝐨-𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 and 𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐬-𝐨𝐧 always striving to complete projects successfully.

[{'company': {'id': 86041603, 'name': 'Acanthamoeba Keratitis Eye Foundation', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFUEex755JW7Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1652451168705?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=gMwZuq4HKK7iCnIg_Rgv7r_nsIwhWIIfD-9vU0XiqbE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/akeyefoundation/', 'employees': {'start': 0, 'end': 1}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Hoorn, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Acanthamoeba Keratitis Eye Foundation', 'description': None, 'title': 'Founder and Chairman', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}, {'location': 'Hoorn, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Acanthamoeba Keratitis Eye Foundation', 'description': "After being an Acanthamoeba Keratitis Patient and becoming a Patient Advocate, I've created a support group (English and Spanish) to provide a secure place to talk about this rare disease and give support to the warriors and their family / friend that are going through it. As well as share the latest news on Acanthamoeba Keratitis and Raise Awareness so others don't have to go through what I went.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/acanthamoebakeratitissupportgroup", 'title': 'Founder & Administrator Acanthamoeba Keratitis Support Group - Grupo de Soporte', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Mandalas by Juliette', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Mandalas by Juliette', 'description': 'discovered the magic of painting mandalas thanks to a friend who invited her to a workshop from one of the well know mandala painters Paul Heussenstaam. After spending one week full time immerse in the magic of mandalas, a new door opened and she discovered the power of mindfulness through painting mandalas. Since then she has been drawing and painting mandalas and feels blessed for having this passion and being able to share it with the world.

I didn’t change, I just found myself and my passion. – Juliette', 'title': 'Artist', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Acanthamoeba Keratitis Patient Advocate', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'company': 'Acanthamoeba Keratitis Patient Advocate', 'description': "(Now integrated in the Acanthamoeba Keratitis Eye Foundation www.akeyefoundation.com)

By experiencing AK (Acanthamoeba Keratitis) it has become my mission to bring awareness so others don't go through it, to educate contact user wears do and don't, to let AK warriors know they are not alone, there are support groups and tell their stories, to provide tips, list of hospitals, confocal scanners as well as articles and researches.

This website is created with the aim to be a platform for all parties involved (AK patients, Support Groups, CL users, CL manufacturers, Corneal Specialists, Ophthalmologist, Optometrist, Researchers, ...)

This diseases is not so known but sadly the numbers are raising worldwide and this side will be in due time in multilingual.

Short summary: Because I let water water be in contact with my contact lenses I got AK - Acanthamoeba Keratitis (a parasite that destroys your cornea and eye). I was able to save my eye thanks to an emergency cornea transplant (beyond grateful to the donor). 

This illness is horrible and not many ophthalmologist know how to diagnosed nor treat it. We need to let the world know AK exist and needs to be addressed by education, protocol of treatment and support.", 'title': 'Founder and administrator of Acanthamoebakeratitis.info', 'employment_type': 'Freelance'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1861370, 'name': 'Nomadic International Business Psychology', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEkKDA5fbGauw/company-logo_400_400/0/1605590877913?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=XBcg7PQqygq9iO8jewDr8Zlmb3xUDY03u3dMvrpQ3uc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/nomadicibp/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amersfoort', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'Nomadic International Business Psychology', 'description': 'Nomadic IBP is a niche consultancy specialized in virtual teamwork, leadership development and cross cultural management.
